channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-39211|2024-09-27T19:04:41.063Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows%20and%20zoom%20rooms%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper privilege management in Zoom Desktop Client for Windows and Zoom Rooms for Windows before 5.15.5 may allow an authenticated user to enable an information disclosure via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39213|2024-09-27T19:05:47.094Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows%20and%20zoom%20vdi%20client
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements in Zoom Desktop Client for Windows and Zoom VDI Client before 5.15.2 may allow an unauthenticated user to enable an escalation of privilege via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39209|2024-09-27T19:03:35.453Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper input validation in Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before 5.15.5 may allow an authenticated user to enable an information disclosure via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39208|2024-09-27T19:02:37.370Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20linux
item.description: Improper input validation in Zoom Desktop Client for Linux before version 5.15.10 may allow an unauthenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39215|2024-09-27T19:08:23.362Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Improper authentication in Zoom clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-43591|2024-09-27T19:19:10.330Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20macos
item.description: Improper privilege management in Zoom Rooms for macOS before version 5.16.0 may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39203|2024-09-27T18:59:21.922Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20client%20for%20windows%20and%20zoom%20vdi%20client
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption in Zoom Team Chat for Zoom Desktop Client for Windows and Zoom VDI Client may allow an unauthenticated user to conduct a disclosure of information via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39214|2024-09-27T19:07:24.020Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20sdk%27s
item.description: Exposure of sensitive information in Zoom Client SDK's before 5.15.5 may allow an authenticated user to enable a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-36535|2024-09-27T18:47:30.828Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Client-side enforcement of server-side security in Zoom clients before 5.14.10 may allow an authenticated user to enable information disclosure via network access.

item.description: Improper input validation in Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before 5.14.7 may allow an unauthenticated user to enable an escalation of privilege via network access.

item.description: Improper input validation in Zoom SDK’s before 5.14.10 may allow an unauthenticated user to enable a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24698|2024-09-27T19:28:28.333Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Improper authentication in some Zoom clients may allow a privileged user to conduct a disclosure of information via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-43585|2024-09-27T19:16:27.688Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20mobile%20app%20for%20ios%20and%20sdks%20for%20ios
item.description: Improper access control in Zoom Mobile App for iOS and Zoom SDKs for iOS before version 5.16.5 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a disclosure of information via network access.
